actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

official_title: To require that not less than 25 percent of amounts spent by the Department of Defense during fiscal year 1990 for advertising for military recruiting purposes be spent for advertising in newspapers.

summary.text: Requires that not less than 25 percent of the amount spent by the Department of Defense during FY 1990 for advertising for military recruitment purposes be spent for advertising in newspapers.

titles.title: To require that not less than 25 percent of amounts spent by the Department of Defense during fiscal year 1990 for advertising for military recruiting purposes be spent for advertising in newspapers.
